Titolo: Verify SGP Generator Full Responsiveness on Desktop

contenuto.Step Description: Open the SGP Generator application in a desktop web browser (e.g., Chrome, Firefox, Edge).
contenuto.Expected Result: The application loads successfully without layout issues.
contenuto.Precondizioni: SGP Generator application is deployed and accessible via a supported desktop browser.
contenuto.Risultato Atteso: SGP Generator displays and functions correctly at all common desktop resolutions.

contenuto.Step Description: Resize the browser window to various widths (e.g., 1920px, 1366px, 1024px, 800px, 600px).
contenuto.Expected Result: The layout and content adapt fluidly to each width, maintaining usability and readability.

contenuto.Step Description: Interact with all primary features (e.g., navigation, form inputs, buttons) at each width.
contenuto.Expected Result: All features remain accessible and functional at all tested widths.

contenuto.Step Description: Open the SGP Generator application in a mobile browser (Safari for iOS, Chrome for Android).

contenuto.Precondizioni: SGP Generator application is deployed and accessible via a supported mobile browser.
contenuto.Risultato Atteso: SGP Generator displays and functions correctly on both iOS and Android devices in all orientations.

contenuto.Step Description: Rotate the device between portrait and landscape orientations.
contenuto.Expected Result: The layout and content adapt fluidly to both orientations, maintaining usability and readability.

contenuto.Step Description: Interact with all primary features (e.g., navigation, form inputs, buttons) in both orientations.
contenuto.Expected Result: All features remain accessible and functional in both orientations.

contenuto.Step Description: Open the SGP Generator application in a browser at various supported resolutions (desktop, tablet, mobile).

Titolo: Display of Bet Builder Carousel for Events with Precompiled SGP Enabled and Available

contenuto.Step Description: Navigate to the detail page of an event that is part of a competition for which SGP precompiled bets are enabled in Redax (SGP Generator section).
contenuto.Expected Result: The event detail page loads successfully.
contenuto.Test Group: Mobile IOS, Mobile Android, App IOS, App Android, Desktop
contenuto.Precondizioni: User is logged in and has access to the event detail page. SGP precompiled bets are enabled for the event in Redax. Backend provides precompiled SGP bets for the event.
contenuto.Dataset: Event with SGP precompiled enabled and available precompiled bets.
contenuto.Risultato Atteso: The Bet Builder carousel is visible above the SGP Experience area only when both SGP precompiled bets are enabled and available for the event.
contenuto.Linked Work Items: Carosello Dett Avv – Condizioni di visualizzazione

contenuto.Step Description: Ensure that, for this event, the backend engine provides precompiled SGP bets to the frontend (markets are available and quoted).
contenuto.Expected Result: Precompiled SGP bets are received by the frontend for this event.

contenuto.Step Description: Observe the area above the SGP Experience section on the event detail page.
contenuto.Expected Result: The Bet Builder carousel is displayed above the SGP Experience area.

Titolo: Verify Quota Button Calculation and Display

contenuto.Step Description: Access the Carosello Dett Avv page with at least one precompilata card displayed.
contenuto.Expected Result: The page and precompilata card load successfully.
contenuto.Precondizioni: SGP Generator has provided a precompilata with multiple pronostici and their odds. Bonus multipla rules are known.
contenuto.Dataset: Precompilata data with odds and bonus multipla rules.
contenuto.Risultato Atteso: Quota button displays the correct total quota, including any bonus multipla.
contenuto.Linked Work Items: Carosello Dett Avv – Struttura Card Precompilata

contenuto.Step Description: Identify the Quota button on the precompilata card.
contenuto.Expected Result: Quota button is visible on the card.

contenuto.Step Description: Obtain the individual odds (quote) for each pronostico in the precompilata.
contenuto.Expected Result: All individual odds are available for calculation.

contenuto.Step Description: Manually calculate the expected total quota (product of all individual odds, including any applicable bonus multipla).
contenuto.Expected Result: Manual calculation yields the expected quota value.

contenuto.Step Description: Compare the displayed quota on the button with the manually calculated value.
contenuto.Expected Result: Displayed quota matches the manually calculated value, including bonus if applicable.

Titolo: Verify caching of precompiled cards for an event within X minutes

contenuto.Step Description: Navigate to the detail page of a specific event (Event A) at time T0.
contenuto.Expected Result: Precompiled cards for Event A are displayed.
contenuto.Precondizioni: User is authenticated and has access to the event detail page. X (cache duration) is configured as per business requirements.
contenuto.Dataset: Event A with precompiled cards available; valid user credentials.
contenuto.Risultato Atteso: Upon returning to the event detail page within X minutes, the user sees the same precompiled cards as at the initial visit.
contenuto.Linked Work Items: Memorizzazione in cache delle precompilate su avvenimento

contenuto.Step Description: Navigate away from the event detail page to another section of the site.
contenuto.Expected Result: User is redirected to another section; no error occurs.

contenuto.Step Description: Return to the detail page of Event A within X minutes from T0.
contenuto.Expected Result: The same precompiled cards as initially displayed at T0 are shown, with no changes.

Titolo: Verify cache expiration of precompiled cards after X minutes

contenuto.Step Description: Navigate to the detail page of a specific event (Event B) at time T0.
contenuto.Expected Result: Precompiled cards for Event B are displayed.
contenuto.Precondizioni: User is authenticated and has access to the event detail page. X (cache duration) is configured as per business requirements.
contenuto.Dataset: Event B with precompiled cards available; valid user credentials.
contenuto.Risultato Atteso: After X minutes, returning to the event detail page causes the precompiled cards to be reloaded (not served from cache).
contenuto.Linked Work Items: Memorizzazione in cache delle precompilate su avvenimento

contenuto.Step Description: Navigate away from the event detail page to another section of the site.
contenuto.Expected Result: User is redirected to another section; no error occurs.

contenuto.Step Description: Wait for more than X minutes after T0.
contenuto.Expected Result: Elapsed time exceeds the configured cache duration.

contenuto.Step Description: Return to the detail page of Event B after X minutes have passed.
contenuto.Expected Result: Precompiled cards are reloaded (may differ from those seen at T0 if data has changed).

Titolo: Verify caching of precompiled cards is user-specific and does not leak between users

contenuto.Step Description: User 1 logs in and navigates to the detail page of Event C at time T0.
contenuto.Expected Result: User 1 sees precompiled cards for Event C.
contenuto.Precondizioni: Two distinct user accounts exist. X (cache duration) is configured as per business requirements.
contenuto.Dataset: Event C with precompiled cards available; credentials for User 1 and User 2.
contenuto.Risultato Atteso: Precompiled cards are cached per user session; no data leakage occurs between users.
contenuto.Linked Work Items: Memorizzazione in cache delle precompilate su avvenimento

contenuto.Step Description: User 1 navigates away from the event detail page.
contenuto.Expected Result: User 1 is redirected to another section; no error occurs.

contenuto.Step Description: User 2 logs in (different account) and navigates to the detail page of Event C within X minutes from T0.
contenuto.Expected Result: User 2 sees precompiled cards for Event C, but these are generated for User 2 (not User 1's cached data).

Titolo: Verify that navigating to a different event does not serve cached cards from another event

contenuto.Step Description: Navigate to the detail page of Event D at time T0.
contenuto.Expected Result: Precompiled cards for Event D are displayed.
contenuto.Precondizioni: User is authenticated and has access to multiple event detail pages. X (cache duration) is configured as per business requirements.
contenuto.Dataset: Events D and E with precompiled cards available; valid user credentials.
contenuto.Risultato Atteso: Each event detail page displays its own precompiled cards; no cross-event cache leakage occurs.
contenuto.Linked Work Items: Memorizzazione in cache delle precompilate su avvenimento

contenuto.Step Description: Navigate away from Event D to another section of the site.
contenuto.Expected Result: User is redirected to another section; no error occurs.

contenuto.Step Description: Navigate to the detail page of Event E within X minutes from T0.
contenuto.Expected Result: Precompiled cards for Event E are displayed, not those from Event D.

Titolo: Verify cache refresh when precompiled cards are updated during cache period

contenuto.Step Description: Navigate to the detail page of Event F at time T0 and note the precompiled cards displayed.
contenuto.Expected Result: Precompiled cards for Event F are displayed and noted.
contenuto.Precondizioni: User is authenticated and has access to the event detail page. Ability to update precompiled cards in backend. X (cache duration) is configured as per business requirements.
contenuto.Dataset: Event F with precompiled cards available; valid user credentials; backend access to update cards.
contenuto.Risultato Atteso: Cached precompiled cards are shown within X minutes even if backend data changes; after X minutes, updated cards are loaded.
contenuto.Linked Work Items: Memorizzazione in cache delle precompilate su avvenimento

contenuto.Step Description: Navigate away from the event detail page to another section of the site.
contenuto.Expected Result: User is redirected to another section; no error occurs.

contenuto.Step Description: While away, update the precompiled cards for Event F in the backend (simulate data change).
contenuto.Expected Result: Precompiled cards for Event F are updated in the backend.

contenuto.Step Description: Return to the detail page of Event F within X minutes from T0.
contenuto.Expected Result: The user still sees the original precompiled cards as at T0, not the updated ones (cache is respected).

contenuto.Step Description: Wait until X minutes have passed since T0, then refresh the event detail page.
contenuto.Expected Result: The updated precompiled cards are now displayed (cache expired and new data loaded).

Titolo: Verify DWH Tracking for Precompiled SGP Card Bets

contenuto.Step Description: Ensure the DWH system and SGP Card Generator integration is deployed and configured as per DWH_SGP Generator specifications.
contenuto.Expected Result: DWH system is operational and ready to receive bet data from precompiled SGP Cards.
contenuto.Precondizioni: DWH system and SGP Card Generator integration must be deployed and configured. Test SGP Cards must be available. Access to DWH query tools is required.
contenuto.Funzionalità: DWH Tracking of SGP Card Bets
contenuto.Dataset: Precompiled SGP Card, valid user account, DWH access credentials.
contenuto.Risultato Atteso: Bets placed using precompiled SGP Cards are correctly tracked and stored in the DWH system according to the DWH_SGP Generator specification.

contenuto.Step Description: Initiate a bet using a precompiled SGP Card through the designated application channel (e.g., POS terminal, web interface).
contenuto.Expected Result: Bet is successfully placed and acknowledged by the application.

contenuto.Step Description: Verify that the bet transaction is logged and transmitted to the DWH system with all required fields (e.g., card ID, bet details, timestamp, user ID) as specified in DWH_SGP Generator.
contenuto.Expected Result: DWH receives and stores the bet data with all mandatory fields populated.

contenuto.Step Description: Query the DWH system for the specific bet using unique identifiers (e.g., card ID, transaction ID).
contenuto.Expected Result: The bet record is retrievable and matches the original transaction details.

Titolo: Verify DWH Tracking Failure for Invalid SGP Card Bets

contenuto.Step Description: Attempt to place a bet using an invalid or corrupted precompiled SGP Card through the application channel.
contenuto.Expected Result: The application rejects the bet and provides an error message.
contenuto.Precondizioni: DWH system and SGP Card Generator integration must be deployed. Invalid SGP Card must be available for testing. Access to DWH query tools is required.
contenuto.Funzionalità: DWH Tracking of SGP Card Bets
contenuto.Dataset: Invalid or corrupted SGP Card, DWH access credentials.
contenuto.Risultato Atteso: Failed bet attempts with invalid SGP Cards are not tracked or stored in the DWH system.

contenuto.Step Description: Check the DWH system for any record of the failed bet attempt using the card ID or transaction ID.
contenuto.Expected Result: No record of the failed bet is present in the DWH system.

Titolo: Verify DWH Tracking for Multiple Bets from the Same Precompiled SGP Card

contenuto.Step Description: Place multiple bets sequentially using the same precompiled SGP Card through the application channel.
contenuto.Expected Result: Each bet is successfully placed and acknowledged by the application.
contenuto.Precondizioni: DWH system and SGP Card Generator integration must be deployed. A valid SGP Card must be available. Access to DWH query tools is required.
contenuto.Funzionalità: DWH Tracking of SGP Card Bets
contenuto.Dataset: Precompiled SGP Card, DWH access credentials.
contenuto.Risultato Atteso: Multiple bets from the same SGP Card are individually tracked and stored in the DWH system.

contenuto.Step Description: Query the DWH system for all bets associated with the specific SGP Card ID.
contenuto.Expected Result: All bets are individually tracked and stored in the DWH system with unique transaction records.

Titolo: Verify DWH Tracking for Boundary Values in SGP Card Bets

contenuto.Step Description: Place a bet using a precompiled SGP Card with minimum allowed bet value through the application channel.
contenuto.Expected Result: Bet is successfully placed and acknowledged by the application.
contenuto.Precondizioni: DWH system and SGP Card Generator integration must be deployed. Precompiled SGP Cards with minimum and maximum bet values must be available. Access to DWH query tools is required.
contenuto.Funzionalità: DWH Tracking of SGP Card Bets
contenuto.Dataset: Precompiled SGP Cards with min/max bet values, DWH access credentials.
contenuto.Risultato Atteso: Bets with boundary values are correctly tracked and stored in the DWH system.

contenuto.Step Description: Place a bet using a precompiled SGP Card with maximum allowed bet value through the application channel.
contenuto.Expected Result: Bet is successfully placed and acknowledged by the application.

contenuto.Step Description: Query the DWH system for both bets using their transaction IDs or card ID.
contenuto.Expected Result: Both bets are tracked and stored in the DWH system with correct bet values.

Titolo: Verify DWH Data Integrity for SGP Card Bets

contenuto.Step Description: Place a bet using a precompiled SGP Card through the application channel.
contenuto.Expected Result: Bet is successfully placed and acknowledged by the application.
contenuto.Precondizioni: DWH system and SGP Card Generator integration must be deployed. Precompiled SGP Card must be available. Access to DWH query tools is required.
contenuto.Funzionalità: DWH Tracking of SGP Card Bets
contenuto.Dataset: Precompiled SGP Card, DWH access credentials.
contenuto.Risultato Atteso: DWH records for SGP Card bets are complete, accurate, and consistent with the original transaction data.

contenuto.Step Description: Query the DWH system for the bet record using the card ID or transaction ID.
contenuto.Expected Result: Bet record is present in the DWH system.

contenuto.Step Description: Verify that all required fields (e.g., card ID, bet details, timestamp, user ID) are correctly populated and match the original transaction data.
contenuto.Expected Result: All fields in the DWH record are accurate and consistent with the source transaction.
